thread.title: A very satisfied customer
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by A very satisfied customer

author: A very satisfied customer
title: A very satisfied customer
text: I was just checking the renewal date of contract with Energia customer care agent as i was after getting a cheaper Quote: from Airtricity. I am glad i did .The lady was really friendly and very helpful and advise she could give a better rate. I was delighted and advised she will e-mail the Quote: to me. true to her words the Quote: arrived within a few minutes. I have to praise this excellent service with is rare now days. Check with your company before you switch over.
